sent.orig: A HARM avionics launcher interface computer allows the F-16 to launch the HARM missile.
sent.trans: 一台HARM导弹的航空电子发射接口计算机使得F-16可以发射HARM导弹。

sent.orig: The F-16 can currently carry two HARMs, though four-HARM loads are being flight-tested at Eglin AFB.
sent.trans: F-16一般情况下可以携带两枚HARM导弹，尽管在伊格林空军基地通过了携带四枚HARM导弹的外挂飞行测试。

sent.orig: The HARM is usually combined with a targeting pod mounted on the right intake hardpoint.
sent.trans: HARM导弹通常与一个安装在进气口右侧外挂点的瞄准吊舱一起使用。

sent.orig: So I't cause any animals harm. That is the way to keep out of harm's way.
sent.trans: 所以我不伤害任何动物，那是避免我们被伤害的最好方法。
